title: Mecherathite
html: MECHERATHITE(Me·cheʹrath·ite).A term pertaining to a person or place named Mecherah, to which Hepher, one of David’s mighty men, was linked either by descent or former residence. (1Ch 11:26, 36) Some scholars suggest that “Mecherathite” may be a variation of “Maacathite,” as at 2 Samuel 23:34.
